ComicInfo.Summary:
At the morgue, Michael comes back to life but only as a horrible zombie-like being and he quickly dies again. Upset, she leaves the Witchblade at the morgue and goes to the gym to burn off some frustration. Kenneth Irons approaches her and invites her to coffee with him. As she leaves she is kidnapped by a gang of crooks who take her on to their yacht and try to force her to put on the Witchblade which they have stolen. She doesn't but it latches on to her again and she is able to escape to Liberty Island where she is attacked by Ian Nottingham!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-15 09:51:06. [CVDB51957]
